text.value: _Refer to health facility for further management_
Did you refer to health facility
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
_Accompany to the health facility for further management._
_Accompany to the health facility for further management._
_Refer to the health facility for further management._
_Refer to the health facility for further management._
_Refer immediately for danger signs management!_
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Person to visit health facility alone
Did you refer and accompany to the health facility?
Has the clinician recommended shifting from daily to monthly visits?
_ has been on ART treatment for years and months_
_Ask the clinician to stop daily visits based on how the patient is doing at the next appointment_
_Explain to that you will not need to visit them daily anymore but during the monthly home visit instead_
_Refer to the health facility for further management._
_Accompany to the health facility for further management._
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Is experiencing any of the following signs?
Danger signs and side effects screening
Does have any challenges taking their medication?
_Plan to accompany on their next appointment._
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the next appointment date?
_Based on profile, you should follow them on:_
_Educate other household members on TB prevention and refer everyone to the health facility where over 5 will be screened for TB while under 5 will be started on IPT_
_Follow up with referred persons for contact tracing: Everyone in the HH should go to the health facility where with over 5 will be screened for TB while under 5 will be started on IPT_
_Remind the caregiver to ensure adheres to treatment._
Are there other family members living in the same household as
Did you refer the household members for contact tracing?
You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is experiencing any of the following signs?
_Educate on TB drugs side effects using TB counselling cards_
_Refer to the health facility for further management._
_Accompany to the health facility for further management._
Danger signs and side effects screening
Does have any challenges taking their medication?
Is still enrolled in TB program
Would you like to submit an exit form for
_Next appointment date is . Plan to accompany _
_Give the patient hope using Joseph's story in the TB counselling cards_
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the next appointment date?
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo_
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza ku chipatala kuti akathandizidwe_
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo._
_Tumizani mwansanga kuchipatala akakhala ndi zizindikiro zoopsa izi!_
_**Kufufuza zizindikiro zoopsya za matenda a TB** _
Kodi munatumiza ndi kupelekeza ku chipatala?
Kodi adotolo avomereza kuti mutha kusiya kuyendera wodwalayo tsiku ndi tsiku ndikuyamba kumuyendera kamodzi pa mwezi?
_ wakhala ali pa ART kwa zaka , ndi _
_Pemphani kwa adotolo kuti musiye kuyendera wodwalayo tsiku ndi tsiku malingana ndi momwe aliri pa ulendo wotsatira wa kuchipatala_
_Mufotokozeleni kuti simumamuyendelanso tsiku ndi tsiku koma m'malo mwake kamodzi pa mwezi pa nthawi yoyendera mabanja yokha_
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo_
_Pelekezani ku chipatala kuti akalandire chithandizo china._
Kupweteka kwa mutu kwa tsiku ndi tsiku
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi akuwona zina mwa zizindikiro zowopysa izi kapena zovuta zobwera chifukwa cha kumwa mankhwala
Kufufuza kwa zizindikiro zoopsya zodza kamba ka mankhwala
Nanga akukumana ndi mavuto ena aliwonse kamba ka mankhwalawa?
_Konzekelani zomuperekeza kuchipatala pa tsiku lofunika kupita ku chipatala._
Tsiku lina loti apite ku chipatala ndi liti?
Kuyendera munthu amene ali pa mankhwala a HIV
Kutsatira ndondomeko ya kamwedwe ka mankhwala a HIV
Kumwa mankhwala a TB mwa ndondomeko
_Malingana ndi momwe mbiri ya iliri pangani kalondolondo:_

_Phunzitsa pabanjapo momwe angapewere TB ndipo tumizani aliyense kuchipatala kuti akawapime onse oposera zaka zisanu ngati ali ndi TB ndipo kuti onse ochepera zaka zisanu akalandire mankhwala oteteza ku TB._

_Pangani kalondolondo pa banja lomwe papezeka munthu wa TB Tumizani aliyense oposera zaka zisanu kuchipatala kuti akapimidwe ngati ali ndi TB ndipo kuti onse ochepera zaka zisanu akalandire mankhwala oteteza ku TB._
_Kumbutsani anthu omwe akupereka chisamaliro kuwonetsetsa kuti akutsatira ndondomeko wa mankhwala omwe apatsidwa._
Kodi pali anthu ena pabanjapo omwe amakhala limodzi ndi ?
Kodi munatumiza anthu a pa banjapo kuchipatala kuti akafufuzidwe pa nkhani ya TB?
Kulumikiza anthu ena apabanja kuchipatala pa nkhani ya TB
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale chizindikilo china chowopysa!
Kodi akuwona zina mwa zizindikilo izi?
_Phunzitsani za zizindikilo zachilendo zobwera kamba komwa mankhwala a TB pogwilitsa ntchito ma kadi ophunzitsira._
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo._
_Pelekezani ku chipatala kuti akalandire chithandizo china._
Kufufuza kwa zizindikiro zoopsya zodza kamba ka mankhwala
Nanga akukumana ndi mavuto ena aliwonse kamba ka mankhwalawa?
Kodi adakalibe mu program ya TB
Kodi mukufuna kulemba fomu yom'tulutsila mu ndondomeko ya TB.
Kodi anapatsidwa tsiku lotsatira lomwe akuyenera kupita ku chipatala?
Tsiku lina lokawonana ndi adotolo ndi . Konzekelani zomuperekeza kuchipatala pa tsiku lofunika kupita ku chipatala.
_Perekani uthenga wa chilimbikitso kwa odwala pogwiritsa ntchito khani ya Josefe._
Tsiku lina loti apite ku chipatala ndi liti?
Kumwa mankhwala a TB mwa ndondomeko

bind.calculate: if(selected(../side_effects, 'shortness_of_breath') or selected(../side_effects, 'body_pains') or selected(../side_effects, 'swelling_sores_rash') or selected(../side_effects, 'body_pains') or selected(../side_effects, 'diarrhoea') or selected(../side_effects, 'severe_headache') or selected(../side_effects, 'vomiting') or selected(../side_effects, 'severe_abdominal_pain'), 'yes', 'no')
if(../taking_treatment = 'yes', 'adhering to treatment', 'not adhering to treatment')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'difficulty_breathing') or selected(../danger_signs, 'deafness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'jaundice') or selected(../danger_signs, 'vision_loss') or selected(../danger_signs, 'vomitting') or selected(../danger_signs, 'rash'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_joint_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'trouble_swallowing') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fatigue') or selected(../danger_signs, 'loss_of_appetite') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swollen_eyes') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swollen_tongue') or selected(../danger_signs, 'feet_numbness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'dizziness') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')
